content: The properties on the concepts in the UTG code system resources are rendering on the IGPublisher generated pages for those properties defined in hl7.org/fhir/concept-properties.xml, but still not rendering for those properties defined in terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties. @Grahame Grieve can you take a look at the v2tables.xml code system; for example the property definition for v2-table-oid in the UTG properties and the reference to it in v2tables.xml concepts. The definitions are rendering, but not the property values on the pages.

@Grahame Grieve I suspect that these are not displayed because since we have not yet done the initial release of UTG, the infrastructure code systems such as http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties cannot be found as there is no redirect. Can you confirm? If this is so, is there anything that can be done for the infrastructure code systems (this one, and also http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/hl7TermMaintInfra as a stopgap for debugging?
I thought they were all displaying now.
the ones we spot-checked last week were only the ones in the FHIR system: http://hl7.org/fhir/concept-properties None of the ones in the new code system are displaying.
I've been messing with it for a couple hours trying to see if I can figure out what the issue is
and all of the other ones that you added in the tug-concept-properties
I'll check it in the morning, need to crash now
@Ted Klein this should be good now
